mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_authority='ROLE_MEMBER'
select count(*) from member where member_authority='ROLE_MEMBER' and member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from member where member_authority='ROLE_MEMBER' and member_name = #{member_name}
select count(*) from member where join_date >= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')
select count(unique member_id) from member, ordermain where member_id = order_memberid

select rownum, member_name, member_id, member_email from( select order_memberid, count(order_memberid), member_name, member_id, member_email from ordermain, member where order_memberid = member_id group by order_memberid, member_name, member_id, member_email order by count(order_memberid) desc ) where rownum <= 5

select rownum, member_nickname, member_id, member_email from( select member_nickname, count(member_nickname), member_id, member_email from member, palbang where palbang_nickname = member_nickname group by member_nickname, member_id, member_email order by count(palbang_nickname) desc ) where rownum <= 5
